alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:19AM CST until January 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations will vary greatly depending on elevation. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches across the highest terrain and 2 to 4 inches over the foothills. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Far East Tennessee Mountains, including the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy snow may bring down trees and power lines, causing power outages.
info.instruction: evening If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
